title: (x) What is this font? - condensed sans for 'Weapons of Mass Creation' poster - Knockout {Florian}
content:
Can anyone tell me what is this font?

[http://www.gomediazine.com/design-articles/news-design-articles/new-limi...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011084705/http:/www.gomediazine.com/design-articles/news-design-articles/new-limited-edition-posters-for-weapons-of-mass-creation "http://www.gomediazine.com/design-articles/news-design-articles/new-limited-edition-posters-for-weapons-of-mass-creation")

The font i want to know is what is at the bottom of the poster. A little compressed. "WEAPONS OF MASS CREATION".

Best regards,  
Sant10.
author: Sant10

comments.content:
Hi Sant10,

that’s [Knockout](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011084705/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100013).  
F

——  
 [Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011084705/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2 "Frequently Asked Question – What do I enter in the “Title” line?")

Thank you Florian.

Does exists a free font like that or very similar?

--  
Sorry about the title, im new in this forum.

Great Jan, thank you. It's no the same but it is very similar.

Best regards,  
Sant10.
If you want the same you gotta license Knockout.
